welcome_message_body: Welcome to Peabody, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, delicious restaurants, and unique culture. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Logan International Airport, primarily used by domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, used by both domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan International Airport, primarily used by JetBlue and other domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal at Logan International Airport, used by all international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
